name: Club
description: Encompasses ararebo, ball clubs, batons, and other one-handed clubs.

name: Dagger
description: Encompasses all daggers, knives, kunai, screwdrivers, shivs, sais, tantos, tekpis, and other short, sharp objects.

name: Greatclub
description: Encompasses all large clubs, bats, kanabo, tetsubo, and other two-handed clubs.

name: Hammer
description: Encompasses all hand hammers, hardened aspergillums, carpenter’s hammers, crowbars, hand wrenches, and small one-handed hammers that are not considered maces.

name: Hatchet
description: Encompasses all hatchets, handled handaxes, tomahawks, and other one-handed axes.

name: Javelin
description: Encompasses all throwing harpoons, javelins, other light ranged pole weapons.

name: Mace
description: Encompasses all ceremonial maces, rods, virges, and other one-handed maces.

name: Quarterstaff
description: Encompasses all bos, offensive staves, shillelaghs, and other sparring or fighting staves.

name: Scythe
description: Encompasses all scythes, war scythes, and other two-handed slicing farming implements.

name: Sickle
description: Encompasses all billhooks, kamas, kais, hand saws, sickles, and other one-handed slicing farming implements.

name: Spear
description: Encompasses all spears and poles shorter than 8ft.

name: Unarmed
description: Special: Every creature has some form of unarmed attack as this is attacking without a weapon.  Unless stated otherwise, the damage dealt is 1 bludgeoning damage.    Any and all abilities that grant weapon proficiency of choice can also grant proficiency in Unarmed attacks, and is treated the same, adding your Strength Modifier and Proficiency to attack rolls, and Strength Modifier to damage rolls.

name: Light Crossbow
description: Encompasses all any general two-handed crossbow.

name: Dart
description:
Encompasses all bo shuriken, gypsy arrows, martiobarbuli, plumbatas, and other handheld darts.
Special: You can use either your Dexterity or Strength modifiers for attack and damage rolls.

name: Shortbow
description: Encompasses all curved bows, flat bows, and all types of small or average bows.

name: Sling
description: Encompasses all slings.

name: Slingshot
description: Encompasses all slingshots.

name: Battleaxe
description: Encompasses all medium battle axes that can be either one- or two-handed.

name: Chain Whip
description:
Encompasses all chain whips, kusari-fundo, meteor hammers, slungshots, and surujins.
Special: You can use this weapon to Grapple or Trip a creature within this weapon’s reach. A creature grappled by this weapon is not able to move further away from you, but does not lose its movement speed.

name: Flail
description: Encompasses all ball-and-chain flails, chigirikis, nunchaku, and all other one-handed flails.

name: Glaive
description: Encompasses all glaives, bills, fauchards, halberds, naginatas, partisans, ranseurs, sovnyas, war scythes, and some small-tipped pole arms.

name: Greataxe
description: Encompasses all large two-handed axes, including bardiches (long pollaxes), dane axes, lochaber axes, panabas, and and some double-bitted poleaxes.

name: Greatsword
description: Encompasses all two-handed swords, including broadswords and longswords.

name: Knuckles
description: Encompasses all hand-worn weaponry, such as brass knuckles and knuckle-weighted gloves.

name: Lance
description:
Encompasses all lances, and pikes.
Special: You have disadvantage when you use a lance to attack a target within 5ft of you. Also, the lance requires two hands to wield when you aren’t mounted.

name: Maul
description: Encompasses all mauls, monster mauls, sledgehammers, and spike mauls.

name: Midsword
description: Encompasses all “hand and a half” or bastard swords, katanas, and any other swords that can be wielded with either one or two hands.

name: Morning Star
description: Encompasses all spiked clubs.

name: Pickaxe
description: Encompasses all pickaxes, mattocks, and war picks.

name: Pike
description:
Encompasses all spears and poles longer than 8ft.
Special: You have disadvantage when you use a pike to attack a target within 5ft of you.

name: Rapier
description: Encompasses all fencing swords, including rapiers and backswords.

name: Scimitar
description: Encompasses all one-handed hacking, slicing, or slashing swords, including scimitars, falcatas, falchions, hangers, khopeshes, kopides, kukris, machetes, sabers, and yatagans.

name: Shortsword
description: Encompasses all all shortswords or one-handed swords, including gladii, long knives, smallswords, and xiphoses.

name: Trident
description: Encompasses all bidents, leisters, military forks, pitchforks, trishulas, and any polearm or spear with multiple prongs.

name: Warhammer
description: Encompasses all warhammers.

name: Whip
description: Encompasses all whips, bullwhips, cat o’ nine tails, crops, knouts, quirts, scourges, and sjamboks.

name: Blowgun
description: Encompasses all blowguns and fukiyas.

name: Hand Crossbow
description: Encompasses any one-handed crossbow.

name: Heavy Crossbow
description: Encompasses any heavy-duty, high-propulsion crossbow.

name: Repeating Crossbow
description: Encompasses any magazine-based crossbow.

name: Longbow
description: Encompasses all compound bows, flat bows, reflex bows, and other types of longbows.

name: Throwing Star
description: Encompasses all chakrams, shuriken, hira shuriken, and throwing stars.

name: Buckler
description: AC +1. Can be used as a weapon.

name: Shield
description: AC +2.

name: Tower Shield
description: AC +2, Versatile (AC +3).
